summary.overview: This JCL executes an IMS Batch Message Processing program for the CARDDEMO application to process card demonstration data. The program performs data processing or update operations using specific control parameters and sequence numbers.
business_functions: Execute IMS batch message processing for card demonstration system
Process card demo data with control parameters and sequence numbers
Perform batch data processing operations on card application data
Generate system output logs for monitoring batch execution results

CBPAUP0J.jcl.program_overview: Processes card demonstration data in IMS batch environment

datasource_summary.name: IMS System Resource Library (IMS.SDFSRESL)
datasource_summary.function: Contains IMS system components and resources required for program execution

datasource_summary.name: Production Application Load Library (XXXXXXXX.PROD.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains production application programs and modules for execution

datasource_summary.name: IMS Procedure Library (IMS.PROCLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains IMS procedure definitions and control statements for system operations

datasource_summary.name: IMS Program Specification Block Library (IMS.PSBLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains database access control definitions for IMS programs

datasource_summary.name: IMS Database Description Library (IMS.DBDLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Contains database structure and schema definitions for IMS databases

datasource_summary.name: Control Parameter Input (SYSIN)
datasource_summary.function: Provides processing control parameters and configuration settings for program execution

datasource_summary.name: System Output Messages (SYSOUX)
datasource_summary.function: Captures system messages and program output for monitoring and review

datasource_summary.name: Standard Program Output (SYSOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Contains standard program output messages and processing results

datasource_summary.name: Abnormal Termination Output (SYSABOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures error information and diagnostic messages when program terminates abnormally

datasource_summary.name: Debug and Error Analysis Output (ABENDAID)
datasource_summary.function: Provides debugging information and error analysis data for troubleshooting

datasource_summary.name: Job Restart Recovery File (IEFRDER)
datasource_summary.function: Supports job step restart and recovery processing capabilities

datasource_summary.name: IMS Logging Recovery File (IMSLOGR)
datasource_summary.function: Supports IMS logging and recovery processing for data integrity

datasource_summary.name: Program Print Output (SYSPRINT)
datasource_summary.function: Contains program print output and status messages for business review

datasource_summary.name: Memory Dump Output (SYSUDUMP)
datasource_summary.function: Provides memory dump information for technical analysis in case of program failure

datasource_summary.name: IMS Error Messages Output (IMSERR)
datasource_summary.function: Captures IMS error messages and diagnostic information for system monitoring
